summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Public Content Management System with versioned content and admin approval workflow

ui_bugs.issue: Had duplicate code causing syntax errors - FIXED during testing

passed_tests: GET /api/public-content/current for all content types (marketing, technical, modules)
Public pages load updated content after approval
Marketing Landing page loads and displays updated content
Technical Hub page loads and displays updated content
Modules Catalog page loads and displays updated content
Navigation between public pages works correctly
Admin Content Studio interface loads after PIN login
Content versioning workflow (create → edit → save → approve)
Public pages auto-update after admin approval
Content Studio shows version history and status
